review: X-com is one of the best strategy based games!First time I played, I could never get off the game. The charactor development in this game is really good, you get to choose what they look like and develop your soldiers class tree.

review: This game is too overated!Do not get this game because it is really crap in all ways!OMG!

One of the best 3D survival games, still adding a few things but really fun to play, cuffing people and stealing their stuff or killing them is really fun.One of the things I hate is that when you die you lose your stuff so I could have spent a day getting good stuff and getting to a certain spot and then I die either from a zombie or most likely from a person.
This game you will have awesome fun!There is different game modes like: Survival, Roleplay and in single player its sandbox witch then you can mess around a little bit!
This is the best zombie game ever!Everyone should get this game
